item.description:
EVENT: Join us for an outing to the Boston Harbor Islands.  We’ll take the Harbor Islands Ferry to Spectacle.  This is a 20 minute ride with a great view of Boston Harbor and all of its Islands.  After we get off the ferry We will begin a hike and then relax to a jazz concert being put on by a Berklee College of Music.  Bring water, hat, sunscreen, bug spray, and binoculars!  Rain cancels.

 

For information on what Spectacle Island and the Ferry have to offer go to www.bostonislands.com and

Click on the link “Visit The Islands”.

MEET: 11:15 AM at the Long Wharf Marriott (ferry departs at 11:30).

RSVP:  REQUIRED by Friday, Aug. 3rd.  TC will then contact you with specific itinerary. 

COST: $15 for the ferry + There is a $5 guest fee which can be credited toward a full Mosaic membership, which costs $25.
item.how_to_find_us: David will be wearing a Mosaic Cap and waiting at Long Wharf

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: ANNUAL HARBOR ISLAND TRIP
